subject: PRODUCT SCHEMATICS INQUIRY . . . .
description_text:
Hi guys,

We are trying to assist one of your customers who has purchased this
product from yourself and now wishes to mount it on his Playseat Challenge.
That is where we come in.

I wish to get my hands on the schematics for this product -
[image: image.png]

Particularly the hole mounting measurements. It would be great if you could
add these to your product description, technical support part of your
website.

Cheers Team Simsonn - Keep doing what you're doing!

All the best.

Mark @ Lowdown Shifter

.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Fryer,     Here are the dimensions you requested. We will post them on our website. Thank you for your feedback!

Hey guys,

What awesome customer service!
Thank you for this! Very helpful.

We will create a product for your products to be installed onto the
Playseat Range.

Have a great weekend ahead.

Warmest regards,

Mark @ Lowdown Shifter

.



On Fri, Aug 15, 2025 at 2:59â€¯AM service@simsonn.com
